row_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) >= 1)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(is_returning) >= 1)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) = 0)
col_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 9)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 16)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 3)
row_desc: Queen has at least one lip sync win.
Queen returned to the competition during any season.
Queen has zero lip sync wins.
